name: Endless Violence
description:
Grab your guns and slay some shapes in this endless top-down shooter! You're a circle with a gun, trying to survive an ever-increasing assault of enemies on a small room.

How to play:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Point and shoot

Q - Return to Main Menu

Guns:

- Pistol; single-shot gun with no cooldown.

- Shotgun; multiple shots at once, high damage with a slowish rate of fire. Unlocked at 60 points.

- Submachine Gun; auto-firing, normal damage with an extremely fast rate of fire. Unlocked at 100 points.

Enemies:

- Triangle; basic cannon fodder. medium speed and 3 hp.

- Square; tanky shapes. slow speed and 8 hp. starts spawning at 10+ points.

- Pentagon; speedy boys. fast speed and 2 hp. starts spawning at 20+ points.

- Hexagon; boss enemy. extremely slow speed, 35 hp, has a gun and starts spawning at 80+ points.
